title: Math Worksheet Generator
geometry_p: Calculate area and perimeter of shapes

multiplication_table.chart_description: The chart will be partially pre-filled to help learning.

addition_subtraction.digital_root_description: Digital roots of the answers will be shown below the problems for self-checking.
addition_subtraction.error_invalid_digits: Please enter valid digit counts (1-7) for both numbers.
addition_subtraction.error_invalid_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (>= 1).
addition_subtraction.error_max_problems: Max 50 problems for this format. Please choose a smaller number.

multiplication_division.digital_root_description: Digital roots of products/quotients will be shown for self-checking.
multiplication_division.error_mult_digits: Multiplication: Enter valid digit counts (1-4) for factors.
multiplication_division.error_div_digits: Division: Enter valid digit counts (Divisor: 1-4, Quotient: 1-3).
multiplication_division.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).

rational_canonical.description: Students should simplify the fraction to its lowest terms.
rational_canonical.error_max_val: Max value for numerator/denominator must be at least 2.
rational_canonical.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).
rational_canonical.warning_generation: Note: Could only generate {generatedCount} of {numberOfProblems} requested problems with the "Ensure Reducible" constraint. Try increasing Max Value or unchecking the option.
rational_canonical.control_sum_grid_subtitle: (For mixed numbers like A B/C, sum B+C. For proper fractions N/D, sum N+D. For whole numbers W, sum is 1. If fraction is 0 (0/D), sum is D.)

rational_operations.description: Operations will be a mix of addition and subtraction. Result should be simplified. Control sums will be shown for self-checking.
rational_operations.error_max_val: Max value for N/D must be at least 1.
rational_operations.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).
rational_operations.control_sum_grid_subtitle: (Simplify result to A B/C or N/D. Sum B+C or N+D. For whole numbers W, sum is 1. For 0/D, sum is D. For negative results, use absolute value of numerator for sum, e.g. -2/5 means sum is 2+5=7)

rational_mult_div.avoid_whole_nums_label: Avoid Results that are Whole Numbers
rational_mult_div.description: Operations will be a mix of multiplication and division. Result should be simplified. Control sums will be shown for self-checking.
rational_mult_div.error_max_val: Max value for N/D must be at least 1.
rational_mult_div.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).
rational_mult_div.warning_generation: Note: Could only generate {generatedCount} of {numberOfProblems} requested problems with the "Avoid Whole Numbers" constraint. Try increasing Max Value or unchecking the option.
rational_mult_div.control_sum_grid_subtitle: (Simplify result to A B/C or N/D. Sum B+C or N+D. For whole numbers W, sum is 1. For 0/D, sum is D. For negative results, use absolute value of numerator for sum, e.g. -2/5 means sum is 2+5=7)

proportion.max_base_label: Max Value for Base Ratio (a, b):
proportion.description: Problems will be proportions with one missing value. Students solve for x, verify using cross-multiplication, then check their answer's digital root against the grid. Each problem guarantees integer solutions.
proportion.error_max_base: Max value for base ratio must be between 1-15.
proportion.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).
proportion.warning_generation: Note: Could only generate {generatedCount} of {numberOfProblems} requested problems. Try adjusting the parameters.
proportion.digital_root_grid_subtitle: (Find the digital root of your answer x and compare to the grid below)

decimal_rational.description: Problems convert between decimals and fractions. Self-check uses digital roots: for decimal answers (ignore decimal point), for fraction answers (sum numerator + denominator).
decimal_rational.error_max_decimal_places: Max decimal places must be between 1-4.
decimal_rational.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).
decimal_rational.warning_generation: Note: Could only generate {generatedCount} of {numberOfProblems} requested problems. Try adjusting the parameters.
decimal_rational.digital_root_grid_subtitle: (For decimal answers: ignore decimal point, find digital root. For fraction answers: add numerator + denominator, find digital root)

percentage.description: Calculate percentages in various forms. Self-check uses digital roots of the final answer (round to nearest whole number if decimal).
percentage.error_max_number: Max number value must be at least 10.
percentage.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).
percentage.digital_root_grid_subtitle: (Find digital root of your final answer, rounded to nearest whole number)

geometry.description: Calculate area and perimeter of basic shapes. Self-check uses digital roots of the final answer (round to nearest whole number if decimal). Use π ≈ 3.14 for circles.
geometry.error_max_dimension: Max dimension value must be at least 2.
geometry.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).
geometry.digital_root_grid_subtitle: (Find digital root of your final answer, rounded to nearest whole number. For circles, use π ≈ 3.14)

linear_equations.description: Solve linear equations for x. Self-check uses digital roots of the solution (use absolute value if negative).
linear_equations.error_num_problems: Please enter a valid Number of Problems (1-50).
linear_equations.digital_root_grid_subtitle: (Find digital root of your solution. Use absolute value if solution is negative)

script.invalid_num_problems_alert: Please enter a valid number of problems.
